reviewText: I purchased the set of 3 DVD of this "You Can Do It" set and am very happy with them.  You can see a trailer on Denise's website.  The location is a contemporary building interior (mainly white) and Denise is wearing bright and happy colours.  Music is typical canned music. The workout is a good all-over workout with dumbbells, easy for anybody to follow.  Make it harder by increasing the weight as you progress.
Easy to follow.  You can do all in one day or pick and choose and combine with cardio.  Excellent!  Highly recommend
